snippet.title: UNO™ - DSiWare - trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
NOW AVAILABLE IN EUROPE - Available December 2009 in North America.
With a multiplayer mode played locally or via Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, UNO™ has never been so fun and easy, so be the first to get rid of all your cards!
More: www.gameloft-UNO.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/UNO_gameloft

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
